tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Jenn was an awesome professor. She actually made plant biology (she taught this section in 20B) really interesting! Take a class with her if you get the chance!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Jenn Yost was a great professor. Take a class with her if you have the chance! She taught the plant portion of 20B. I never thought I would be so interested in learning about plant biology, but she made it so fun!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Amazing professor.Jen was very helpful,clear in her lectures, very enthusiastic,loved what she was teaching.Everything she taught was what was on the exam,many pictures,drawings;anybody could learn from her.She\'s that good of a prof.Quizzes every week, one midterm, one final, some greenhouse labs, and xtra cred opportnities.Hard class,but studyhard

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: INCREDIBLY GOOD PROFESSOR. Yost is very committed to her students and is VERY excited about the material. So excited that it will tune up your excitement for plants! She gives a lot of good examples and is very straight forward. Before I took the class I was loathing the plant section but she completely changed that.Recommended you take HER class.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She was awesome. One word: Enthusiastic. She made going to class so fun and interesting. She made plants relevant to my life more so than the animal section. Go to lecture. Awesome teacher!!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Jenn is great. The plant portion is not that difficult to understand. All you need to do is pay attention which is not hard since Jenn is so enthusiastic and funny that it\'s impossible for you to fall asleep in class. You can tell she really enjoys teaching this subject. I recommend taking her.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Jenn was awesome! I had no real interest in this class, but within the fist lecture, Jenn changed that. VERY helpful and fair. She made class exciting. After taking her bio class I felt cheated from my other ones-just goes to show a good professor can make ALL the difference!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Jenn Yost is great. Really fascinating lectures, helpful office hours, and her enthusiam for her subject and for teaching really show. The class was challenging but not discouragingly so, if you attend lecures and study the study guides you should be fine. I would take any class from her again.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Before I took this class, I had no interest in the plant section whatsoever. I have to say, Professor Yost is one of the best professors I\'ve ever had. She\'s showed me just how fascinating plants really are. She has a great sense of humor, and you can tell really cares that all her students do well in her class.
